description: Build a complete fullstack book catalog application with React frontend and Express backend demonstrating the GitHub Workflow Blueprint

tasks.title: Setup monorepo structure with client and server workspaces
tasks.description:
Configure pnpm workspace with React (Vite) frontend and Express backend.

## Client Setup
- React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- ESLint and Prettier configuration
- Jest testing framework
- Responsive CSS styling

## Server Setup
- Express + TypeScript
- CORS middleware for client communication
- In-memory data store (Book model)
- Jest + Supertest for API testing

## Workspace Configuration
- pnpm-workspace.yaml defining client/ and server/
- Root package.json with parallel dev scripts
- Shared TypeScript configuration patterns
- Coordinated build and test scripts
acceptanceCriteria: Monorepo structure with client/ and server/ workspaces
pnpm install works from root and installs both workspaces
pnpm dev runs both client and server in parallel
TypeScript compiles without errors in both workspaces
Quality checks (lint, type-check) pass for both

tasks.title: Create Book REST API with CRUD operations
tasks.description:
Implement Express backend with complete Book API.

## API Endpoints
- GET /api/books - List all books
- GET /api/books/:id - Get book by ID
- POST /api/books - Create new book
- PUT /api/books/:id - Update book
- DELETE /api/books/:id - Delete book

## Data Model
- Book interface (id, title, author, year, genre, timestamps)
- In-memory BookStore class with async methods
- Sample seed data (3 programming books)

## Validation & Error Handling
- Request body validation
- 400 for missing fields
- 404 for not found resources
- 500 for server errors

## Testing
- Supertest integration tests for all endpoints
- Test CRUD operations and error cases
- 90%+ coverage target
acceptanceCriteria: All 5 REST endpoints implemented and working
API tests pass with good coverage
Server runs on port 3001 by default

tasks.title: Build React frontend with Book list and details
tasks.description:
Create responsive React UI to display books from API.

## Components
- App component with layout and routing logic
- BookList component with grid display
- BookCard component for individual books
- Loading and error states

## API Integration
- Fetch books on component mount
- Display loading spinner while fetching
- Error handling with user-friendly messages
- Vite proxy configuration for /api routes

## Styling
- Responsive CSS Grid layout
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Purple/indigo gradient theme matching blueprint
- Card-based UI with hover effects

## Testing
- Jest + React Testing Library
- Test rendering and API integration
- Mock fetch for unit tests
acceptanceCriteria: Books display in responsive grid layout
Loading state shows while fetching data
Error state displays on API failure
UI is mobile-responsive (works on all screen sizes)

tasks.title: Add create and edit book forms with full CRUD UI
tasks.description:
Implement forms for creating and editing books with API integration.

## Features
- CreateBookForm component with all fields
- EditBookForm component (pre-populated)
- Form validation (client-side)
- Submit handlers calling API endpoints
- Success/error feedback to user
- Modal or page-based form UI

## API Integration
- POST /api/books for creation
- PUT /api/books/:id for updates
- DELETE /api/books/:id with confirmation
- Refresh book list after mutations

## User Experience
- Clear form labels and placeholders
- Validation feedback before submit
- Loading state during API calls
- Success message on completion
- Error handling with retry option

## Testing
- Form validation tests
- Submit handler tests with mocked API
- Integration tests for complete flows
acceptanceCriteria: Can create new books via form

tasks.title: Add search and filter functionality
tasks.description:
Implement client-side search and filtering for books.

## Search Features
- Search bar component in header
- Real-time filtering (no API calls needed)
- Search by title, author, or genre
- Case-insensitive matching
- Clear search button

## Filter Options
- Filter by genre (dropdown)
- Sort by year (ascending/descending)
- Sort by title (alphabetical)
- Combine search and filters

## UI/UX
- Search results count display
- Empty state when no results
- Preserve filters in URL query params (optional)
- Fast, responsive filtering (<100ms)

## Testing
- Search functionality tests
- Filter and sort tests
- Combined search + filter tests
- Performance tests with large datasets
acceptanceCriteria: Search and filters can be combined
Empty state shows when no matches
